# Copilot Instructions for Nexkit Projects

## General Guidelines
- Always follow the project's coding standards
- Write clear, readable, and maintainable code
- Include appropriate comments and documentation
- Test your code thoroughly

## Project-Specific Rules
- Follow the language-specific instructions in this directory
- Use the prompts in the prompts directory for guidance
- Reference the chatmodes for different interaction styles

## Development Workflow
1. Plan your changes using the plan chatmode
2. Implement features following the implement prompt
3. Test your code using appropriate testing frameworks
4. Document your changes following the document prompt
5. Review your code following the review prompt

## Getting Help
- Check existing code for patterns and examples
- Refer to the instruction files for language-specific guidance
- Use the debug chatmode when troubleshooting issues
- Ask for clarification when requirements are unclear
